title: On the Storage Capacity of Nonlinear Neural Networks

tldr.text: This work considers the Hopfield associative memory for storing m patterns xi(r) in { - 1, + 1}(n), r = 1, em leader,m.tbnd6; Sgn(x), which is used in hardware implementation of associative memories and gives a rigorous lower bound for the memory size of this (ANN) by using large deviations estimates.
